title: Can my TalkBand B2 connect to more than one phone?
answer:
Your TalkBand B2 allows you to connect to two phones simultaneously. You can answer incoming calls from either phone.

1. Connect your TalkBand B2 to the first phone using Bluetooth.

2. Press and hold the side button. When the Bluetooth icon blinks, select HUAWEI B2–XXX from the Bluetooth device list on the second phone to connect to your TalkBand B2.

Note:

This will break the Bluetooth connection with the first phone.

3. On the first phone, reconnect to your TalkBand B2 by selecting HUAWEI B2–XXX from the Bluetooth device list.

The icon will be displayed when both phones are connected to your TalkBand B2.
